name: 高得畬
objective:
* Introduction 
      -Moore’s rule
      -Cost and TW's IC design 
* Production
      -Mask
      -Processing
      -Cross-section , latch up
      -Layout, Reverse Engineering
      -Electro-Migration & RC
      -CMP & Design Rule
* Gate Level Design
      -Logic Gates, Noise Margin
      -Power, Fan-out and loading
      -Timing of Logic Networks
* Logic Networks
      -Simulation, Cross Talk
      -Test Patent Generation & DFT
* Introduction to Fin-FET
schedule:
week / date / topics
00. 02/21/20 因應武漢肺炎疫情延後開學
00. 02/28/20 和平紀念日
01. 03/06/20 Chapter 1 Introduction (Moore’s rule)
02. 03/13/20 Chapter 1 Introduction (Cost and TW)
03. 03/20/20 Chapter 2 (Mask)
04. 03/27/20 Chapter 2 (Processing)
05. 04/03/20 兒童節補假一天 
06. 04/10/20 Quiz 1, Chapter 2 (Transistors)
07. 04/17/20 Chapter 2 (Cross-section , latch up)
08. 04/24/20 Midterm Examination
09. 05/01/20 Review; Chapter 2 (Layout, Reverse Engineering)
10. 05/08/20 Chapter 2 (Electro-Migration, RC & CMP,Design Rule)
11. 05/15/20 Chapter 3 (Logic Gates, Noise Margin)
12. 05/22/20 Chapter 3 (Power, fan-out and loading, timing )
13. 05/29/20 Chapter 4 (Simulation, Cross Talk)
14. 06/05/20 Quiz 2, Chapter 4 (ATPG & DFT)
15. 06/12/20 FinFet
16. 06/19/20 Final Examination
17. 06/26/20 調整放假
18. 07/03/20 Exam review and Display
scorePolicy:
Two quizzes 30% (15% for each)
Midterm 35%
Final 35%
materials:
ULSI 製程技術 (新文京開發出版)
by: 劉博文

Digital Integrated Circuits 
A Design Perspective
By: Jan M. Rabaey, Anantha Chandrakasan, and Borivoje
